mapper.select:
select * from (select i.drug_id drugId,i.drug_name as drugName,i.wholesale_number wholesaleNumber,i.wholesale_price wholesalePrice, i.wholesale_total_price wholesaleTotalPrice,i.wholesale_no wholesaleNo,i.create_time createTime, i.warning_value warningValue,i.manufacturer manufacturer,i.drug_type drugType,i.prescription_type prescriptionType, i.unit unit,i.conversion_of conversionOf,sum(wholesale_number) as inventory from inventory_yjd i GROUP BY drug_name)as t
and t.drugName like concat('%',#{drugName},'%')
and t.drugType like concat('%',#{drugType},'%')
and t.manufacturer like concat('%',#{manufacturer},'%')
and t.prescriptionType like concat('%',#{prescriptionType},'%')

select i.drug_id drugId,i.drug_name drugName,i.wholesale_number wholesaleNumber,i.wholesale_price wholesalePrice, i.wholesale_total_price wholesaleTotalPrice,i.wholesale_no wholesaleNo,i.create_time createTime, i.warning_value warningValue,i.manufacturer manufacturer,i.drug_type drugType,i.prescription_type prescriptionType, i.unit unit,i.conversion_of conversionOf from inventory_yjd i
and i.wholesale_no like concat('%',#{wholesaleNo},'%')
and i.drug_name like concat('%',#{drugName},'%')
and i.drug_type like concat('%',#{drugType},'%')
and i.manufacturer like concat('%',#{manufacturer},'%')
and i.prescription_type like concat('%',#{prescriptionType},'%')
and i.create_time between #{firstTime} and #{endTime}
select distinct manufacturer manufacturer from inventory_yjd
select distinct drug_type drugType from inventory_yjd
